problem.purpose: Defines the problem to be solved
problem.summary: This file is the base CSS file for the entire website, it includes a modern CSS reset, and some base stylings. I want you to remove all properties that are not 100% percent needed. I would consider anything layout related, like flex settings, margins etc to be needed. The file is 565 lines long, I would ideally like to get it down to 200-300
problem.detailed-description: Using best practice CSS standards, revise this stylesheet to be as minimal, functional and useful as possible for the base CSS styles defined within it. Reduce the line count down to 200-300. Ensure no repitition and group selectors where possible. Also include comments for the different sections and future sections - This is just the global CSS file which will contain styles that are reused across the site.
problem.objective: Reduce CSS file to essential lines, rely on smart defaults and reduce repitition

context.purpose: Provides technology context, constraints and existing code

constraints.compatibility: The code must use conventions and practices that are supported by Safari 14 (16610.1.28) as a minimum standard

success-criteria.purpose: Defines how to measure the success of the solution

functional-requirements.requirement: 200-300 line count maximum. Only essential layout styles. no repitition.
